Magical Turkey

Book now

Overview

A sailing trip along the Turkish coastline is an unforgettable travel experience. Your vivid encounter with the elements of nature, your daily yoga sessions, the benefits of a vegetarian, fresh and healthy Mediterranean cuisine, together with the option of an energy spending massage, or a snorkeling tour, all will combine to bring your spirit and body in balance. Most rapidly you will have forgotten about the everyday stress that you might experience in your professional life.The day starts with a sun salutation, or a smooth awakening yoga practice, in the pleasant light of the first sunbeams, as the sun climbs over the horizon of a deep blue sea.

Practical info

Dates:

24 - 31 October 2021

Location:

Bodrum, Turkey

Recommended for:

Sail with our beautiful wooden yachts along the Mediterranean and Aegean Sea, wake up in picturesque quite bays, enjoy daily yoga sessions, meditations, water sports, guided hikes and healthy vegetarian food. Drop out of your hectic daily life and recharge your body and soul.

Price: From EUR 499

Book now

FAQS

Feel free to contact me if you can't find the answer to your question.

Inclusions

* Airport Transfer

* Welcome Package

* Full access to all workshop sessions

* 7 night’s accommodation on the yacht

* Bed Linen & Bath towels 

* Vegetarian meals: 7x brunch breakfast, lunchtime fruit, 4 pm Tea-time with cookies and 7x dinner will be served

* Water and tea are served free of charge on the boat, throughout the day

* 2 Yoga Classes per day – (no need to bring your own yoga mat), mornings and evenings 60-90 min. The yoga sessions start on Sunday evening and the last session is given on Friday morning.

* High quality yoga mats, blocks, belts and blankets are provided on board, in sufficient quantity.

* Equipment for snorkeling and some water sports equipment are provided on board.

* Harbour Tax in Turkey

* Crew service 

* Diesel & Gasoline 

* Use of equipment on board 

* Yacht insurance (we advise you to take out your own individual travel insurance)

 

Exclusions

Not included are:

* Air fares

* Other beverages: smoothies, fruit juice, soft drinks & alcoholic beverages

* Wi-Fi use €10/week

What else?

What do I need to bring?

Just the usual travel equipment like swim suit, toiletries, comfortable clothes etc.

When does the boat leave?

Embarkation Saturday from 2 pm, disembarkation the following Saturday 9 am. YogaCruising reserves the right to modify traveling routes, time schedules and the sequence of events due to weather conditions or organizational demands.

If I arrive or leave any other day than Saturday can you help me with accommodation?

Early arrivals are possible if you have better direct flights to Bodrum. Our cooperation with 2 hotels at Marina 5 is walking distance to our office and anchorage. Pomelon Club Hotel on the Beach and Martı Pension.

 

About Bodrum, Turkey

Bodrum is a district and a port city in Muğla Province, in the southwestern Aegean Region of Turkey. It is located on the southern coast of Bodrum Peninsula, at a point that checks the entry into the Gulf of Gökova, and is also the center of the eponymous district. The city was called Halicarnassus (ancient Greek: Αλικαρνασσός) of Caria in ancient times and was famous for housing the Mausoleum of Mausolus, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Built by the Knights Hospitaller in the 15th century, Bodrum Castle overlooks the harbour and the marina. From the picturesque Marina we will sail very close to the Greek islands along the Turkish coastline. A part of Turkey that is very authentic with welcoming, kind, friendly people and little to none big hotel chains.

Experience living on a yacht

Sail along picturesque bays with crystal clear blue water

Experience the welcoming Turkish culture

Join me now
